data.name: Shinsekai: Into the Depths Hidden Tracks
data.detailed_description:
Dive in and enjoy additional tunes featured in Shinsekai: Into the Depths!

The 34+ minute soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
